about_the_game:
Embark on another captivating journey through the heart of New Zealand with this extraordinary puzzle adventure. Seamlessly weaving intricate challenges with the captivating allure of New Zealand's diverse landscapes, this expansion pack builds on the adventure you love.

Whether you're a novice starting with a cozy 30-piece puzzle or a seasoned enthusiast taking on a formidable 285-piece masterpiece, this expansion ensures that each player will be captivated by the sense of accomplishment.

As you delve deeper into this new set of puzzles, every completed puzzle unveils fresh New Zealand vistas, showcasing the breathtaking beauty of this island nation. From the pristine beaches lapped by turquoise waters to the rugged grandeur of snow-capped mountains, you're not merely solving puzzles; you're unraveling the tapestry of New Zealand's natural wonders.

Central to the experience is a meticulously crafted map that charts New Zealand's rich tapestry of landscapes. With each puzzle you conquer, this map comes alive, revealing unexplored regions, uncovering hidden gems, and setting off spectacular animations that celebrate your achievements.

What truly distinguishes "New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 1" is its breathtaking artwork. Each puzzle is a canvas that captures the essence of New Zealand's natural beauty in vivid colors and intricate detail, making the process of assembling them a mesmerizing visual spectacle.

For those craving a pulse-quickening challenge, timed trials await, testing your speed and puzzle-solving skills. Progressing through the expansion also unlocks special rewards, from guardian spirits of New Zealand to magical tools that aid you in your quest to piece together the country's most stunning landscapes and uncover hidden treasures.

"New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 1" is a continuation of the tribute to the majestic beauty of New Zealand's landscapes. With its compelling storytelling, breathtaking artwork, and an array of difficulty levels, it promises more hours of immersive gameplay. Dive into this mesmerizing world and experience the magic of New Zealand's natural wonders all over again.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 330 MB available space

Recommended:
